description: Silence ads in Accuradio, Spotify, Tidal & any Custom App. Lightweight & minimal Features: - Custom Apps Support: Configure and silence ads in ANY app. - Pre-configured for Accuradio, Spotify (Full & Lite), Tidal, Soundcloud, Pandora & LiveOne. - Lightweight (~ 150KB) - Minimal UI - Debug Log View: Integrated logging for easy troubleshooting. - No bloat/external dependencies - All locally processed, no data collection - No inapp purchases or ads - Open source If you want to know on how this works & more.. check github.
